summary: Comprehensive testing of Multi-Tenant Architecture, Super Admin Portal, and Project Management features. All 23 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI tests passed for multi-tenant login, super admin dashboard, and projects page with sub-tasks.
critical_code_review_comments: Service Worker is properly registered for PWA support
Push notification VAPID keys are MOCKED/placeholder - needs real implementation for production
seed_data_creation: Multiple TEST_ prefixed projects and templates created during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Multi-tenant architecture is fully functional. Tenant lookup API works with company codes. Super Admin can view tenants, statistics, and impersonate users. Projects API supports CRUD with sub-tasks and templates. Service Worker registered for PWA.

mocked_apis.Push notification VAPID server: Using placeholder keys - needs real implementation for production push notifications

multi_tenant_login.details: Login with company_code + email + password works correctly. Tenant info returned in response.

tenant_lookup_api.details: Returns tenant name and code for valid company codes. 404 for invalid codes.

super_admin_login.details: Super admin authentication works at /admin route.

super_admin_dashboard.details: Dashboard shows total tenants, users, tasks statistics and recent tenants list.

projects_api.details: Full CRUD for projects with sub-tasks. Status transitions work correctly.

project_templates.details: Can create templates and use them to spawn new projects.

service_worker_pwa.details: Service worker registers correctly. Console log confirms: 'Service Worker registered'.

data_isolation.details: Projects and users are filtered by tenant_id. Verified in tests.
